title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 124.8 - Motorist's failure to appear for hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 124.8 - Motorist's failure to appear for hearing

State Regulations

Any motorist who does not appear for a hearing within one
hour after the time for which the hearing has been scheduled, will be deemed to
have failed to appear and such motorist's license will be suspended until a
rescheduled hearing is held or, in the administrative law judge's discretion, security is posted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
124.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
